resources.string:
"System Update will take approximately 10 minutes. You will not be able to use your device during the update, including emergency call.
Please connect power core or make sure the battery life is at least 15%.
Do you want to proceed with the system update?"
Touch to start the system update.
System is restored to previous configuration

"System update process is stopped due to low battery.
Please connect power core before system update."
The update package is not compatible with your current software, please check your software version and version number in Settings and try the correct update package.
The update package is prior to your current software version, please try a newer update package.
